-// gate-test-struct_field_attributes
-
-struct Foo {
-    present: (),
-}
-
-fn main() {
-    let foo = Foo { #[cfg(all())] present: () };
-    //~^ ERROR attributes on struct pattern or literal fields are unstable
-    let Foo { #[cfg(all())] present: () } = foo;
-    //~^ ERROR attributes on struct pattern or literal fields are unstable
-}
